mapper.select: select order_id, order_tbl_id, m.member_firstname as member_name, p.product_name as product_name, p.product_color, product_count, check_stock, check_shipment from order_tbl o inner join member m on m.member_id = o.member_id inner join product p on p.product_id = o.product_id

select order_id, order_tbl_id, m.member_firstname as member_name, p.product_name as product_name, p.product_color, product_ap, product_storage, product_count, o.product_price, check_stock, check_shipment, order_date, product_img01 from order_tbl o inner join member m on m.member_id = o.member_id inner join product p on p.product_id = o.product_id inner join order_create_number ocn on o.order_tbl_id = ocn.order_group_id where order_id = #{orderId}
